title: Task bar while fullscreened
body: I'll be in game and I am in fullscreen mode but my taskbar of my computer is still on and I don't know how to fix it.

replies.body: Something might be forcing the focus of your screen to shift back to the desktop, which is causing the taskbar to pop back up. Try hitting alt+enter to switch to windowed and back to fullscreen and that should get the taskbar out of the way!
